General.Name: Zhongjin Irradiation Incorporated Company
General.Description: Zhongjin Irradiation Incorporated Company provides irradiation technology services in China. It offers irradiation sterilization services for medical and health care products, food, medicines, packaging materials, and other products; and irradiation modification services for polymer materials. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
